q1: How many calories in a kcal?
a1: 1 kcal (kilocalorie) = 1,000 cal. Food calories are actually kcal.
q2: How do I convert kWh to BTU?
a3: Joules, kilojoules, calories, kilocalories, Watt-hours, kilowatt-hours, BTU, eV, and foot-pounds.
a4: An electron volt (eV) is the energy gained by an electron through 1 volt potential difference.
